update CP_COUPON_CENSUS
SCRAPY_NAME = #{scrapyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update CP_COUPON_CENSUS set SCRAPY_NAME = #{scrapyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCRAPY_ID = #{scrapyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SCRAPY_TIME = #{scrapyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COUPON_NAME = #{couponName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUPON_ID = #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update CP_COUPON cou SET `INDEX` =(select sum(sort) from CP_COUPON_CENSUS cen where cen.STORE_ID=cou.STORE_ID and cou.name= cen.COUPON_NAME
